casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Harry SCEPPE and Harry Richardson, Defendants-Appellees. No. 317. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 11, 1935. Leo J. Hickey, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Vine H. Smith, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City,, of counsel), for the United States.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order reversed in open court.
